Files | Typedefs | Enumerations | Functions
SBL Board Lib

Files

file  sbl_lib_board.h
 This file contains the board related interfaces like pin mux APIs, etc. present in the Secondary Bootloader(SBL) Library. This also contains some related macros, structures and enums.
 

Typedefs

typedef enum sbllibSiliconPackageType sbllibSiliconPackageType_t
 Enum to select the Silicon Package Type of SoC.
 

Enumerations

enum  sbllibSiliconPackageType {

  SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_23X23 = 4, SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_23X23_HPP = 5
}

Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum sbllibSiliconPackageType

Enum to select the Silicon Package Type of SoC.

Enumerator
SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN 

Silicon Package type is Unknown

SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_12X12 

Silicon Package type is 12x12

SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_15X15 

Silicon Package type is 15x15

SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_17X17 

Silicon Package type is 17x17

SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_23X23 

Silicon Package type is 23x23

SBLLIB_SILICON_PACKAGE_TYPE_23X23_HPP 

Silicon Package type is 23x23 (High Performance Package) Applicable only for the TDA2Px package.

Function Documentation

This function configures UART Pin Mux.

uint32_t SBLLibGetSiliconPackageType ( void  )

This function gets the silicon package type of the SoC.

Returns
packageType Refer enum sbllibSiliconPackageType_t for values.
uint32_t SBLLibGetSiliconRev ( void  )

This function gets the silicon revision of the SoC.

Returns
siliconRev For TDA2xx 0: Silicon Rev 1.0 1: Silicon Rev 1.1 2: Silicon Rev 2.0 For TDA2Ex 0: Silicon Rev 1.0 1: Silicon Rev 2.0 For TDA3xx 0: Silicon Rev 1.0 1: Silicon Rev 1.0A 2: Silicon Rev 2.0
